descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value:
Turkish 121-3 is the final part of a three-quarter intermediate course in modern Turkish. It is designed for students who have completed Turkish 121-2 or equivalent. This course aims to continue basic Turkish grammar, and further develop reading, writing, speaking and listening skills acquired in elementary Turkish, through the use of printed and audio-visual materials. The course also provides insights into modern Turkish culture through the language.

With this in mind, the course will focus on:
-knowledge and understanding of intermediate Turkish grammar as well as a wide range of Turkish vocabulary, structures and expressions
-the ability to understand and produce passages in written Turkish of medium length on everyday topics
-the ability to understand spoken Turkish and to engage in spoken discourse of medium complexity on everyday topics

descriptions.name: Registration Requirements
descriptions.value: Successful completion of Turkish 121-2, or permission of the instructor.

descriptions.name: Teaching Method
descriptions.value: Lectures on grammar are based on Suzan Ozel's Elementary Turkish: A Communicative Approach. Audio materials are provided by the instructor.

descriptions.name: Evaluation Method
descriptions.value: Homework consisting of (but not limited to) assignments from the exercises in the textbook/handouts. One midterm and one final exam, as well as grammar and vocabulary quizzes to determine the general level of progress in the classroom.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Grammar reviews will follow Turkish I: A Communicative Approach by Suzan Özel. Additional material of the appropriate level will be provided by the instructor throughout the quarter.

descriptions.name: Class Notes
descriptions.value:
Requirements:

Full attendance and active class participation are strongly encouraged for the successful completion of the course. In addition to regular participation in class activities, it is important to complete all your homework on time.
